page.normal_text:
U N C L A S S I F I E D
U N C L A S S I F I E D
page.enlisting:
• Five distinct server roles – Mailbox: for user mail storage – Client Access: provides client connectivity for non-Outlook users – Hub Transport: mail routing and policy management – Unified Messaging: voicemail integration and inbox/calendar – Edge: Anti-virus/spam protection and policy management • 64-bit only platform – New requirement with Exchange 2007 • Five distinct server roles
